El juego en general es bueno pero si hay algo de lo que me quejo es de sus servidores,soy de colombia,porque rayos aparesco en servidores norteamericanos?,deberia estar en servidores suramericanos pero el juego en si no te permite cambiarlo y te pone donde se le da la gana, el lag es muy severo debido a eso,quizas en consola sea bueno pero por pc,nada recomendado.

Tiene bugs por donde lo mires, una optimizacion horrible, una comunidad tan toxica como mezclar vodka con fernet y manaos, un desbalance de habilidades impresionante y un matchmaking tan lamentable como injusto. Pero aun asi es muy divertido y entretenido.

Trash balance of powers! when something is good for one side it feels like the worst for the other player becouse it does not require skill. I enjoy the game (sometimes) but its one of the games that can make me slam my table and want to throw with my hardware.
Game is really fun in low ranks tho but as soon as you hit rank 4+ its just so rare to get a game where all had fun.

The game has potential to be one to go down in history but the devs need to make the earnable powers weaker or reworked in some way.

Game is okay, but new MM system sucks and not only for newbies, but also for veterans. It's not fun being rank 17-20 with 1 perk and get rank 1 killer with full great perks, tons of exp. and etc. On the one hand it is just fast win for the killer and fast loose for survivors, simple as hell, but on the other hand it's kinda wasting of time for both of teams, because > no fun, no balanced challenge, no farm, etc.

 And no, u can't learn how to play versus gen. rushers with voice and full perks when u play killer or versus good skilled shooter when u play survivor.

 Just pls. delete this stupid MMR system...

 The only good thing about this system is that sometimes u face great representatives of DbD community( i'm not joking, i don't mean toxic retards) who can understand that u r newbie, and they let u farm some points and even let u escape, or let u hit them and etc.

 10 toxic gen rushers with flashlights in bright costumes out of 10

p.s. i will change it for positive if smth will be changed in MM system for better balance

Update: they removed new MM system and added crossplay so now it's ok

This game is genuine garbage, 
the devs don't listen to the community, the servers are bad, the game costs money, the community is toxic and S H I T T E D,

if this game was free with dlc payments I would be less harsh on it, but as it stands it is just not worth the money and dedication to play this game, some perks are ''Requierd'' to be ''Good'' at the game, 
the game also runs like trash sommetimes (This might just be me though) 
it is also worth mentioning that with the new billy nerf and prior nerfs a large part of teh community has switched to the killer ''Spirit'' witch makes life HELL for a new and inexperianced player

Some idiot out there: Bu-But i think spirit is a good and balanced killer tha tbrings a new and fun way to pla-
Shut the F**k up, the spirit deathslinger and many other killers are ether SSR RANK SS SUPER MEGA TOP RANK but listen here fucko if you think the spirit is ''balanced'' the n you are a casual S H I T T E R who has never played at the level of a compitent player and should probably go outside to see nature for a while and come back when you have ether played some of both places (AKA Killer and survivor) and come bakc and tell me how it felt coming from anhother side,

as for the problems with survivor .... ............ ............. that would make this review about 100,000,000 words long, just searsh it up and get sucked into the rabbit hole that is ''The survivor meta'' aka a way for Shitters to blame killers for their ''EPIC PERK BUILDS'' not working as intended

TL;DR the game is left to rot by the devoloper who should honestly have pulled the plug a while ago 
teh community is a bunch of S H I T T E R S hwo are toxic and honestly jerk teh game of more than it deserves and the devs don't listen to said community, yet soem small brain troglodites still find ''Enjoyment'' in this game are probably the few russians that ran bambozel on billy before the nerf and the players saying the only really balanced killer in the game was ''OP'' because they are ''So good at the game'' and ''Noone would hit me like that it's obviusly the killer and not the player''
